paths.name: Path of the Warlord
paths.summary: Victory is seized through command and unshakable fury.
paths.description: It's not brutality, it's a calculated risk. You guide your allies with ferocity, into battle no matter how unwinnable. And you always work to come out on top.

feature.Name: Commanding Presence
feature.Description: Allies within 2 tiles gain +1 Accuracy and +1 Damage. When you drop an enemy to 0 Health, all nearby allies gain +2 Accuracy for 1 turn.

paths.name: Path of the Duelist
paths.summary: A blade perfected through grace, patience, and lethal precision.
paths.description: A Duel is the most honorable of fights, one on one and to the death. You fight with grit and determination to strike down the foe standing across you. One blade, one strike, one kill.

feature.Name: Perfect Form
feature.Description: When wielding a single one-handed weapon, gain +2 Accuracy and +1 Damage. If you hit without being hit that round, regain 1 Health.

paths.name: Path of the Bloodmage
paths.summary: Power carved from flesh and paid for in blood.
paths.description: Your body's limits are merely suggestions, push past what is there, break it and reform it, that is your right. Blood is fuel for your magic, and your body will not resist.

feature.Name: Sanguine Casting
feature.Description: Spend up to your level Health to add that much Damage or Healing to your next spell. If the spell kills an enemy, regain half the Health spent.

paths.name: Path of the Stormsinger
paths.description: The song of the heavens calls to you, the rumble, crackle and pop of lightning. Electricity courses through your voice, breaking the air you speak through.

feature.Name: Voice of Thunder
feature.Description: Cast a Lightning spell as if it were one level higher. Lightning spells deal 1 Damage targets wthin 2 units of the target.

paths.name: Path of the Beastcaller
paths.description: Nature is an extension of your body, the creatures who roam it are as much you as you are. You call upon your own pack, you command them, you are the alpha.

feature.Name: Alpha Bond
feature.Description: You may control two animal companions simultaneously. Their attacks deal +1 Damage, and both gain +2 Accuracy when within 3 tiles of you.

paths.name: Path of the Wanderer
paths.summary: The road itself is your home.
paths.description: You have traveled, and will keep traveling, there is no path you will not take, no place you will not see. Forever traveling, forever going, that is your calling.

feature.Name: Unbound Traveler
feature.Description: You cannot be ambushed. Movement speed +1 tile; after every combat, recover 3 Health and 3 Mana.

paths.name: Path of the Shadowblade
paths.summary: The perfect strike leaves no witness.
paths.description: Shadowblades strike from darkness, eliminating targets before they can react. Within the darkness they find their strength, waiting for the perfect time to strike.

feature.Name: Silent Execution
feature.Description: While hidden, your first attack deals +2 Damage. While in darkness or dim light, you are considered hidden.

paths.name: Path of the Silver Tongue
paths.description: You speak such sweet words, people hang on your every word. Such fluent speech is bound to draw even the ones most opposed to you to your side.

feature.Name: Master Manipulator
feature.Description: Attempt to Charm one intelligent creature for 3 turns, they must roll [Insight] contesting [6 + Your Persuasion]. Outside combat, you have advantage on negotiations and deals.

paths.name: Path of the Juggernaut
paths.description: You are a living siege engine, advancing through pain and resistance without slowing. The more wounded they become, the harder they are to stop.

feature.Name: Unstoppable Mass
feature.Description: Gain +2 Armor and +1 Damage when below half Health. You cannot be knocked prone or forcibly moved.

paths.name: Path of the Pyromancer
paths.description: Heat and flame, they are to you as your own soul. You emit a burning presence, scorching the very earth you tread.

feature.Name: Living Flame
feature.Description: Fire spells deal +X Damage, you gain resistance to the Burn Condition.

paths.name: Path of the Frostwarden
paths.summary: The stillness of the glacierâ€™s heart.
paths.description: Oh the stillness of ice, the frost that burns your flesh with its seething cold. They will not move unless you permit it.

feature.Name: Glacial Guard
feature.Description: Ice abilities Slow by 2 and grant you +X Armor for 1 turn per cast.

paths.name: Path of the Revenant
paths.description: You refuse to fall, fueled by stubborn will and defiance of death itself. Each return from the brink makes you deadlier and harder to finish.

feature.Name: Undying Will
feature.Description: When reduced to 0 Health, lose Half your Max Health until your next rest and stand back up with Full Health. You perish if your maximum reaches 0. The first time this triggers each combat gain +X Damage.

paths.name: Path of the Shepherd
paths.description: You command your flock, those who follow you, those who stand beside you. Keep them safe, heal their aches. Bring them peace.

feature.Name: Guardianâ€™s Call
feature.Description: Heal all allies within 2 tiles for [Your Level] Health. Uppon activation, gain +1 Armor and +1 Reflex until your next turn.

paths.name: Path of the Seer
paths.summary: You read the future like a flickering map.
paths.description: Glimpses of all possibilities flashing by, flowing from one second to another, what could possibly happen next? Doesnâ€™t matter if you already know.

feature.Name: Foresight
feature.Description: Predict the next attack or spell within 6 tiles. You or a chosen ally gain +4 Reflex/Armor against it.

paths.name: Path of the Chronomancer
paths.summary: You pull at the seams of time.
paths.description: The fabric of reality unfolds at your finger tips, it reverberates like waves through time. It all makes sense to you, infinities upon infinities, at your grasp.

feature.Name: Temporal Surge
feature.Description: Take an additional action this turn. Gain 1 Fatigue at the end of combat.

paths.name: Path of the Executioner
paths.description: End them all, bring ruin and death to those who dare stand in your way. Be the executioner, be their final moment.

feature.Name: Inevitable End
feature.Description: Deal +2 Damage to targets below half Health. When you kill an enemy, nearby foes suffer â€“2 Accuracy for 1 turn.

paths.name: Path of the Veteran
paths.description: Your knowledge is vast, you have fought many battles, leaving scars all over your flesh. But these scars carry more than pain, they carry experience.

feature.Name: Battle-Hardened
feature.Description: Reroll one failed attack or defense roll. When an ally nearby fails an attack, they gain +2 Accuracy on their next strike.

paths.name: Path of the Artisan
paths.description: Your hands blister, you're covered in wood dust and oils. No matter, it is all worth it in the end, your crafts will carry your name louder than any words ever could.

feature.Name: Master Crafter
feature.Description: Repair or create simple crafts freely (No rolls required). During rest you may imbue 1 item with +1 Damage or +1 Armor until your next rest.

paths.name: Path of the Hunter
paths.summary: You strike before fear sets in.
paths.description: The smell is unmistakeable, your prey is near, rushing from bush to tree top you see it. It lays unaware of your presence, just how you like it.

feature.Name: Predatorâ€™s Edge
feature.Description: The first attack against an ambushed or taunted target deals +2 Damage. Ignore movement penalties from rough terrain.

paths.name: Path of the Miner
paths.description: Hard work is your blood and soul. You dig and dig to find the beauty from within the earth itself. It's almost comforting, being so deep under the soil others call home.

feature.Name: Deep Delver
feature.Description: Gain +2 Armor underground or in darkness. Blunt weapons deal +1 Damage and ignore 1 Armor.
